name: Himins
description: Himins is a MUD, a multi user dungeon with a command line interface. It is written in JavaScript on Node.js and MongoDB. To play Himins you run it on a Node.js server and access the server with a Telnet client from a terminal window.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Himins reports that the following commands work here: !COMMAND_NAMES

commands.name: where
commands.description: Himins reports that you are in the _!PLAYER_LOCATION_ of the *!ROOM_NAME*

commands.name: quit
commands.description: Himins reports that you are in the _!PLAYER_LOCATION_ of the *!ROOM_NAME*
